attributes.action: Expand the key Workers housing scheme to areas of the north of England and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: House prices and current interest rates mean that thousands of new teachers, nurses, police officers and fire officers are unable to afford homes.  The huge gap between income and house prices is not confined to the south and south east, and while MPs are somehow able to afford numerous properties, and while many EU immigrants are given priority housing for doing unskilled work, tens of thousands of us that provide invaluable services to our country are left out in the cold.
